description:
This year at INL we organize the International Day of Light event WITH students FOR students.


Target group: Students from Natural Sciences & Engineering, Design & Arts, Medical & Life Sciences, Business & Management etc. that are soon about to look for traineeships or master research internship opportunities.
We would like to let you know more about the research programmes at INL and want to celebrate with you the "International Day of Light".
This is our program:
14:15 Welcome to INL
14:30 - 15:30 Inspirational short talks @ INL auditorium:

Light and Agriculture; 
Light and Medicine; 
Structures for Light;
Light Based Computing


15:30 - 16:30  INL guided laboratory tour
16:45 - 17:00 Transfer to INL-Gallery at GNRation
17:00 - 17:30 Visit of the artworks created with scientific support from INL
17:30 - 18:30 Networking & Quiz
18:30 - 18:45 Annoucement of Quizz winner and Closing remarks

Practical things: The event starts at INL - and we organize a transfer to GNRation @ City center of Braga, where the event will end.
GNRation is in walking distance from the Braga train station.
name: International Day Of Light 2018 - WITH students FOR students
